record.title: HOUR OF MEETING TOMORROW
record.narrative:
HOUR OF MEETING TOMORROW -- (House of Representatives - October 04, 2007)

[Page: H11300]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 3 p.m. tomorrow, and further, when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Tuesday, October 9, for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
